channel.title: Oh, Don't Get Me Started!
channel.itunes:author: Tony Forte and Mike Zadoroznyj
channel.itunes:subtitle: ODGMS features the rants, stories and observations of Tony Forte.
channel.itunes:summary: Veteran performer Tony Forte delivering his take on politics, the news and life in general. His stories are well researched and interesting and delivered with one of those voices that just makes you want to listen. (Archived Shows available on http://www.odgms.com)
